DOC.brief_summary: Intralipid infusion improve outcome woman recurrent Intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) failure due elevate TH1 cytokine response .
DOC.detailed_description: Infertile patient undergo Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) cycle history repeat implantation failure , intralipid give intervention group . The primary outcome measure clinical pregnancy rate , secondary outcome measure implantation rate , ongoing pregnancy rate , abortion rate .
DOC.criteria: Infertile patient undergo ICSI cycle history repeat implantation failure 1 . Disturbances normal fat metabolism pathologic hyperlipemia 2 . Allergic ; egg , soybean oil , safflower oil . 3 . Severe liver disease , kidney disease , lung disease , anemia , blood clot disorder . 4 . Uterine fibroid , endometrial polyp , endometriosis hydrosalpinx .
